mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Travel_Details (travel_record_id, tourist_spot_id, sequence_order, review, cost, visit_date, photos, latitude, longitude) VALUES ( #{travelRecordId}, #{touristSpotId}, #{sequenceOrder}, #{review}, #{cost}, #{visitDate}, #{photos}, #{latitude}, #{longitude} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, travel_record_id AS travelRecordId, tourist_spot_id AS touristSpotId, sequence_order AS sequenceOrder, review, cost, visit_date AS visitDate, photos, latitude, longitude FROM Travel_Details WHERE travel_record_id = #{recordId} ORDER BY sequence_order ASC
